intent: A 175cm tall, 85kg, 40yo man climbs 2500 steps at about 18cm per step and 40 steps per minute. summarise the Metabolic properties.

reference_answers.fuzzy_match: energy expenditure | 2720 kJ (kilojoules); average energy expenditure per step | 1.1 kJ/step (kilojoules per step); fat burned | 0.0842 kg (kilograms); oxygen consumption | 129.9 L (liters); metabolic equivalent | 7 metabolic equivalents
